basic_info.name: Anantha College of Law Faculty
description: The faculty at Anantha College of Law, Tirupati are highly experienced and well qualified. The college has 12 faculty members who provide proper guidance to the students through their experience. The faculty members are helpful, supportive and have proper understanding in their area of expertise.
Check: Anantha College of Law Tirupati Faculty

faqs.question: What is the application procedure at Anantha College of Law, Tirupati?
faqs.answer: Candidates can apply to the college through offline mode by collecting the application form from the college and filling it and submitting it to the admission office of the college.

faqs.question: What are the facilities provided by Anantha College of Law, Tirupati?
faqs.answer: Anantha College of Law, Tirupati has state of the art infrastructure which provides various facilities to the students such as modern classroom, well stocked library, computer lab, laboratory, and many more.

faqs.question: Is there any entrance exam for admission at LLM at Anantha College of Law, Tirupati?
faqs.answer: Admission to Anantha College of Law is done on the basis of the performance of the candidates in the state entrance exam for UG courses. There is no entrance exam for admission in LLM, as the admission in the LLM is done on the basis of the performance of the candidates in the previous qualifying examination.

faqs.question: Does Anantha College of Law, Tirupati take admission on Management Quota?
faqs.answer: Anantha College of Law, Tirupati takes admission on Management Quota and candidates do not need to take state entrance exam for the admission for UG courses.

Section.name: About Anantha College of Law
Section.description:
Anantha College of Law, established in 2006, is a private college affiliated to Sri Venkateswara University and approved by the Bar Council of India. The college offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of law.
Admission to Anantha College of Law is done on the basis of the performance of the candidates in the state entrance exam. The college has state of the art infrastructure which provides various facilities to the students.
Check: Anantha College of Law Tirupati Admission
